dishes.description: A basic dough, raw tomatoes, fresh mozzarella cheese, fresh basil, and olive oil.
A traditional Thai dish made with stir-fried rice noodles, eggs, tofu, beansprouts, and a multitude of spices.
corn tortilla filled with meat, onion, cilantro, and salsa.
salmon baked with lemon butter and different spices.
A sandwich made of thinly sliced beef cooked on a griddle and served on a sliced roll with cheese, onions, and peppers.
